ReskinError.IOConnected: You can not skin this while it is connected

UI.Title: SkinBox
Sets.Help:
- Dragged skinned items into the container to add it to the set
- Right click or hover loot to remove items from the set
- A set can only contain unique items
- Applying a set will skin the first matching item in your inventory
